text: George David Givot (February 18, 1903 â€“ June 7, 1984) was an actor in movies, television and radio. His strength was speaking in several ethnic dialects. One famous role he played was the voice of Tony in Lady and the Tramp. Givot was born in Omaha, Nebraska and died in Palm Springs, California at age 81. ==Other websites== * Category:1903 births Category:1984 deaths Category:Actors from Omaha, Nebraska
title: George Givot
